processSteps.description: Personal consultation with the doctor to assess needs and create a customized treatment plan

processSteps.title: Treatment Execution

safetyConcerns: All treatments performed by an experienced specialist doctor
Use of highest quality materials approved by health authorities
Sterile environment and strict medical conditions
Personal adaptation of treatment to health conditions and aesthetic needs

faqItems.question: Are botox and hyaluronic acid treatments painful?
faqItems.answer: The treatments involve minimal discomfort. Local anesthetic cream can be applied before injection. Most patients report only a slight pinching sensation.

faqItems.question: How long do the results last?
faqItems.answer: Botox results last between 3-6 months. Hyaluronic acid treatments can last 6-18 months, depending on the treated area and type of material.

faqItems.question: When will I see results?
faqItems.answer: Botox results begin to show within 3-7 days and peak after about two weeks. Hyaluronic acid results are immediate.

faqItems.question: Are there any side effects?
faqItems.answer: Common side effects include mild redness, swelling, or slight bruising at the injection site, which typically resolve within a few days.

faqItems.question: Who is suitable for these treatments?
faqItems.answer: These treatments are suitable for healthy individuals looking to improve their aesthetic appearance. A comprehensive assessment will be conducted during the consultation.

faqItems.question: Is there a minimum age for these treatments?
faqItems.answer: Generally, these treatments are recommended for those over 18. The exact age depends on individual circumstances and medical indication.

faqItems.question: How much do the treatments cost?
faqItems.answer: Treatment costs vary depending on the area treated and amount of material needed. You'll receive an exact quote during your consultation.
